participant_1.name: Sasha
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, with a hint of humor. Values family and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I'm a 46-year-old single dad with kids. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year. I prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Joe
participant_2.personality: Confident and outgoing, often humorous. Enjoys luxury and has a playful demeanor.
participant_2.background: I love listening to Britney Spears. I'm high maintenance and enjoy spending money. I diet a lot.
